name: Abyssal Specter
text: Flying\nWhenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

name: Advance Scout
text: First strike\n{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor: "The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet—all in one direction, none returning."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Air Elemental
text: Flying
flavor: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

name: Angelic Page
text: Flying\n{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

name: Arc Lightning
text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.
flavor: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

name: Argothian Elder
text: {T}: Untap two target lands.
flavor: Sharpen your ears\n—Elvish expression meaning\n"grow wiser"

name: Armored Pegasus
text: Flying
flavor: "I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."\n—Tahlil en-Dal, bounty hunter

name: Azure Drake
text: Flying
flavor:
Little dreamt could seem so cruel
As waiting for the wings outspread,
The jagged teeth, the burning eyes,
And dagger-claws that clench to nerves.

name: Blinking Spirit
text: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Don't look at it! Maybe it'll go away!"\n—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

name: Broken Fall
text: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.
flavor: "I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall."\n—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Cackling Fiend
text: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

name: Catastrophe
text: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
flavor: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

name: Cinder Marsh
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

name: Control Magic
text: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.

name: Counterspell
text: Counter target spell.

name: Crazed Skirge
text: Flying, haste
flavor: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.

name: Curfew
text: Each player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand.
flavor: ". . . But I'm not tired!"

name: Dark Ritual
text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

name: Dirtcowl Wurm
text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.
flavor: Few of Rath's rivers follow a steady course, so many new channels are carved for them.

name: Disenchant
text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew"\n—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

name: Disruptive Student
text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor: "Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."\n—Barrin, progress report

name: Drifting Meadow
text: Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Elvish Lyrist
text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

name: Exhume
text: Each player puts a creature card from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.
flavor: "Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."\n—Sitrik, birth priest

name: Fecundity
text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.
flavor: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

name: Fertile Ground
text: Enchant land\nWhenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
flavor: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.

name: Fire Ants
text: {T}: Fire Ants deals 1 damage to each other creature without flying.
flavor: Visitors to Shiv fear the dragons, the goblins, or the viashino. Natives fear the ants.

name: Flood
text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.
flavor: "A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield."\n—Vibekke Ragnild, Witches and War

name: Giant Growth
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Gorilla Warrior
flavor: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

name: Healing Salve
text: Choose one —\n• Target player gains 3 life.\n• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

name: Heat Ray
text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
flavor: It's not known whether the Thran built the device to forge their wonders or to defend them.

name: Hurricane
text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

name: Infantry Veteran
text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor: "The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."\n—Telim'Tor

name: Land Tax
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Lhurgoyf
text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
flavor: "Ach! Hans, run! It's the Lhurgoyf!"\n—Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

name: Lightning Elemental
text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.

name: Living Death
text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

name: Llanowar Elves
text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
flavor: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.\n—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Man-o'-War
text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."\n—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Mana Leak
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor: "The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."\n—Volrath

name: Maniacal Rage
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
flavor: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

name: Manta Riders
text: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Water is firmament to the finned."\n—Oracle en-Vec

name: Master Decoy
text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor: "A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."\n—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Mogg Hollows
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

name: Nekrataal
text: First strike\nWhen Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.
flavor: "I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My Betrayal is certain—but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say."\n—Jolrael

name: Opportunity
text: Target player draws four cards.
flavor: "He cocooned himself alone in his workshop for months. When he finally emerged, all broad grins and excited chatter, I knew he'd found his answer."\n—Barrin, master wizard

name: Pacifism
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Pestilence
text: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.\n{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Phyrexian Ghoul
text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

name: Pincher Beetles
text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: "No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?"\n—Squee, goblin cabin hand

name: Plated Rootwalla
text: {2}{G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor: " . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ."\n—Skyshroud children's story

name: Polluted Mire
text: Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Prodigal Sorcerer
text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

name: Raging Goblin
text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Ray of Command
text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.
flavor: "Heel."

name: Reanimate
text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor: "You will learn to earn death."\n—Volrath

name: Remote Isle
text: Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: River Boa
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)\n{G}: Regenerate River Boa.
flavor: "But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."\n—Afari, Tales

name: Rolling Thunder
text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
flavor: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

name: Sadistic Glee
text: Enchant creature\nWhenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor: "First blood isn't as important as last blood."\n—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Sanctum Custodian
text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.

name: Sanctum Guardian
text: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor: "Protect our mother in her womb."

name: Sandstorm
text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

name: Scaled Wurm
flavor: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."\n—Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

name: Scryb Sprites
text: Flying
flavor: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

name: Seasoned Marshal
text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
flavor: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

name: Seeker of Skybreak
text: {T}: Untap target creature.
flavor: "We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death."\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Sengir Vampire
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nWhenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

name: Sewer Rats
text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.
flavor: You lie down with rats, and the rats run away.\n—Suq'Ata insult

name: Shower of Sparks
text: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.
flavor: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

name: Skyshroud Elite
text: Skyshroud Elite gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a nonbasic land.
flavor: "Civilization is a conspiracy to disguise the mutilation of nature."\n—Skyshroud elite creed

name: Slippery Karst
text: Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Soltari Foot Soldier
text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: "Children of the Ruins, raised to be warriors, know that life begins when another speaks their names."\n—Soltari Tales of Life

name: Songstitcher
text: {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.
flavor: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.

name: Soul Warden
text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
flavor: Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.\n—Vec teaching

name: Spike Colony
text: Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Spike Feeder
text: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\nRemove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

name: Spike Weaver
text: Spike Weaver enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.\n{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Spike Worker
text: Spike Worker enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.\n{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Steam Blast
text: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor: The viashino knew of the cracked pipes but deliberately left them unmended to bolster the rig's defenses.

name: Subversion
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor: Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.

name: Sun Clasp
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+3.\n{W}: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "And darkness shall be cast from me\nFor my soul resides in the Sun."\n—Femeref dirge

name: Swords to Plowshares
text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

name: Symbiosis
text: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

name: Syphon Soul
text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: Terror
text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Thalakos Lowlands
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Thalakos Lowlands doesn't untap during your next untap step.

name: Tranquility
text: Destroy all enchantments.

name: Trumpeting Armodon
text: {1}{G}: Target creature blocks Trumpeting Armodon this turn if able.
flavor: These are its last days. But it will not go quietly.

name: Unnerve
text: Each opponent discards two cards.
flavor: "If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."\n—Xantcha, to Gix

name: Uthden Troll
text: {R}: Regenerate Uthden Troll.
flavor:
"Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere,
Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near,
Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh
'n da hurt'll disappear."
—Troll chant

name: Vec Townships
text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Vec Townships doesn't untap during your next untap step.

name: Village Elder
text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.

name: Wall of Heat
text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor: At a distance, we mistook the sound for a waterfall . . . .

name: Weakness
text: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets -2/-1.

name: Wildfire Emissary
text: Protection from white\n{1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire."\n—Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat

name: Wind Drake
text: Flying
flavor: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."\n—William Blake,\nThe Marriage of Heaven and Hell

name: Windfall
text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
flavor: "To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."\n—Barrin, master wizard

name: Wrath of God
text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
